text:
A fortnight-long special camp for updating the electoral roll is being organised at the polling stations in the district with a view to eliminating multiple entries in the list and for deleting the names of dead voters. In a release issued here on Tuesday, T. Karikalan, Collector, said voters can furnish information about their relatives or neighbours with multiple entries in the voters list or about dead voters. The camp concludes on February 29.

Free plastic

surgery camp

A free orthopaedic and plastic surgery camp will be held at the Outreach Centre of Jawaharlal Institute of Post-Graduate Medical Education and Research here on February 20. Specialists from JIPMER will camp at the centre and screen the patients from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m.
title: Special camp for voters
